ygData.messageBody:
As was said earlier, using 1HS vs 2HS kinda depends on what you are doing.  If I'm the MT I need all the AC I can get so I use a shield..plus bash is great for interrupting spells.  If I'm there just for extra DPS then I use my 2HS for big damage.  And btw keep all your weapon skills up..there are some really nice 2HB, piercing, and 1HB weapons for knights..one that comes to mind is the Mace of Dark Glory 1HB which has some great stats, 20AC, and it procs a heal.
 
Duke Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Caelitus> Ayonae Ro
Shadowknight of the 54th Suffering

Subject: Re: [EverQuest] 1HS vs 2HS

Think about it this way....
 
Both SK and pally epics are 2HS.  So it's good to keep that skill maxed
 
Yet, pallies get Bash.  In order to use Bash you have to carry a shield, in which case 2HS is not possible.  So it's good to keep 1HS up.
 
SK's I think get a similar ability, or maybe even Bash, but I dont play a SK so I dont know for sure.  But 1HS is also important to SK.
 
On the other hand, pallies and SK's usually work as pullers in groups, so they have to have good Taunting abilities, and sometimes weapons they have can help with taunt by doing more damage.  Go with the weapon that helps with that regardless of 1Hs or 2HS.
 
Just my two cents. 
 
Wulfric
